rows.label: tlk46400079_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Welcome to Seoris Plaza, the heart
of the Holy See of Acedia.

rows.label: tlk46400079_01_msg0002
rows.name:
The plaza is open to citizens and
visitors alike, as a place for rest
and recreation.

rows.label: tlk46400079_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Some use it to practice singing holy
songs, some to educate our younger
citizens, some simply to sit and pray.

rows.label: tlk46400079_01_msg0004
rows.name: All is in thanks to His Holiness, Marveni.
